alert.note: Alert for Furnas (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 29 at 11:29AM CDT until May 29 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Nebraska... Republican River affecting Furnas County. For the REPUBLICAN RIVER...in eastern Furnas County...Minor flooding remains possible. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Republican River between Highway 283 and the Furnas, Harlan County line. * WHEN...Until this evening. * IMPACTS...At 9.0 feet, Minor lowland flooding occurs as the right bank overflows. Water will start flowing through sloughs south of the main channel. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11:15 AM CDT Monday the stage was 8.0 feet. - The river has fallen below flood stage at Cambridge. - Forecast...Near-flood stage levels will remain possible along the Republican River in the eastern half of Furnas County until this evening. - Flood stage is 9.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
